title: Ep. 367 - Can Trump Actually Deport Millions Of Illegals?
description:
President Trump announces plans to deport millions of illegal aliens soon as next week. Does he have the political cojones to follow through? As Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez compares illegal immigration to the Holocaust, a new poll shows she’s immensely unpopular in her own district. Finally, the Washington Post examines the real reason white America turned on OJ Simpson. Spoiler alert: it’s because he murdered his ex-wife and her friend. Date: 06-18-2019
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
